summary: adds new items to the konahrik set
descriptionHtml:
Konahrik. Usually thought of as a mask that is the ultimate in all powers.
Konahrik. A long-lost Dragonborn Dragon priest that rebelled against his friends and was sealed away into his very own mask.
Konahrik. The ancient warlord whose long-lost weaponry terrified both man and dragon alike.
Konahrik. Now he guides you to each of his most powerful weapons.
Konahrik. Gives you a deadly challenge that even the dragonborn might not survive.
Konahrik. Can you find and harness my powers AND my weapons? Or will you too be sealed away, never to walk the land of
Skyrim ever again?
author: blacklight6969
